name: DependabotFailTask
description: Fail a pipeline based on dependabot alerts for a repo
author: robyn-zip

inputs.name: failSeverity
inputs.label: Fail on severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: The severity to fail on. If any alerts are detected at or above this level, the task will fail.

inputs.name: auditMode
inputs.label: Audit mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option if you want the task to return a warning instead of failing the pipeline when alerts are detected.

inputs.name: failOnError
inputs.label: Fail the task on error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defaults to true. Will fail the task if GitHub API fails or data returned is not expected.

inputs.name: githubServiceConnection
inputs.label: GitHub Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: GitHub service connection - recommended way to contact API (Note: token must have correct permissions)

inputs.name: githubToken
inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal Access Token used for accessing GitHub repositories (requires security_events scope)
